price: Tvoj narod Kur'an poriče, a on je istina. Reci: "Ja nisam zadužen da vam Uputu dam,
arabic: وَكَذَّبَ بِهِۦ قَوۡمُكَ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّۚ قُل لَّسۡتُ عَلَيۡكُم بِوَكِيلٖ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wakadhaba bihi qawmuka wahuwa al-ḥaqu qul lastu ʿalaykum biwakīlin
